question: Teddy ____________ of moving closer to the city centre.
We ____________ giving you a lift home.
The Potters ____________ to Dubai at 9:00 tomorrow morning.
____________ is your favorite European city?
____________ much do they charge for a single room with breakfast?
____________ is your brother talking to?
The teacher ____________ believe his excuse for not coming to school yesterday.
Bobby ____________ skinny when he was a child.
____________ to contact Mr. Peterson twice, but didn’t find him.
After a couple of days, Sam finally ____________ up early in the morning.
It took him a month to recover ____________ his illness.
The book exhibition took ____________ at the Carlton Hotel.
I didn’t ____________ Jason to come on time.
I’m sorry but I can’t find it ____________ the map.
They spent the whole day in Alexandria looking at the ____________.
He was lucky to find that ____________ in their law firm.
I think that these trainers belong ____________ your brother.
They usually take ____________ of what I tell them.
We never argue ____________ our teacher.
This dish is very healthy because it consists ____________ fish and vegetables.
Tim ____________ the news, while his son was playing computer games.
Lenny ____________ his old house two months ago.
He didn’t meet Joe and Alf, because they left ____________ than they usually do.
__________ you finish your report on time?
I was resting all day yesterday, because I was ____________ tired.
Robert was crossing the street when he ____________ Fred riding a motorcycle.
This artist is ____________ famous of all three that you mentioned.
That’s the boy ____________ father is our teacher.
Can you tell me ____________ to put these boxes?
Mark, ____________ is only twenty, teaches French.
My doctor advised me to ____________ a sport.
I can’t believe that they ____________ your offer.
When I suggested a walk in the woods, he ____________.
After his mother’s ____________, he moved to Argentina.
It was really ____________ that nobody was hurt in that accident.
Both my children are afraid ____________ the dark.
They did everything in their ____________ to keep the company.
I bought a leather bag that ____________ my new boots.
Both her children have a very vivid ____________.
I’ve got the ____________ that they’re lying again.
The Carltons have never _________ Denmark before.
Have you __________ thought of studying abroad?
Danny __________ tennis since he was a child.
It has been raining heavily __________ our plane took off two hours ago.

We can’t meet Jack today. We __________ to work overtime.

Text 45: 1. Where did Doug and Diane first meet?
Text 45: 2. How did he know where she lived?
options: He asked a friend for directions.
He looked her up in the phone book.
answer: He asked a friend for directions.

question: Text 45: 3. Where does Doug invite her to go with him on Thursday?
Text 45: 4. What is Diane's response to his invitation on Thursday?
options: She can't go out because she has to study.
She is sorry, but she has another date.
She has to work that day, so she can't go.
answer: She has to work that day, so she can't go.

question: Text 45: 5. How does Diane feel about Doug's idea for Friday?
options: She thinks it would be a great idea if she had the time.
She feels that it would be an uninteresting outing.
She has done the activity before, so she'd rather not go.
answer: She feels that it would be an uninteresting outing.

question: NGHE: 46: 1. What is the man's name?
NGHE: 46: 2. Where is the man from?
NGHE: 46: 3. How old is the man?
NGHE: 46: 4. Where did the man meet Sarah?
options: He met her on a bus.
They were introduced at a party.
He saw her in a language class.
answer: He saw her in a language class.

question: NGHE: 46: 5. Sarah's older sister is worried that Nick
options: is going to be a negative influence on her
charges too much money for lessons
answer: is going to be a negative influence on her

question: NGHE: 64: 1. Ten workers have been rescued from an accident 400 feet beneath the streets of New York.
NGHE: 64: 2. The workers had spent the past 26 hours trapped underground.
NGHE: 64: 3. The workers had been digging a tunnel for a new subway line when the roof of their tunnel collapsed.
NGHE: 64: 4. Sixteen men managed to escape immediately, but two were fatally injured.
NGHE: 64: 5. Last night the nine men were recovering in the hospital.
NGHE: 65: 1. Three children who had been missing for two days have been found safe and sound.
NGHE: 65: 2. The three-ten-year-olds, a boy and two girl, disappeared after school on Wednesday.
NGHE: 65: 3. Police had released photographs of the two and had been searching nearby houses.
NGHE: 65: 4. Neighbor spotted three children and alerted the police.
NGHE: 65: 5. The children had slept outside in a garden and realised the concern they caused.

options: Do not park in front of this entrance.
Permission is needed to park here.
Only use this entrance in an emergency.
answer: Do not park in front of this entrance.

options: Drinks cannot be ordered at the bar.
Use this machine when the bar is closed.
There is a drinks machine in the bar.
This machine is not working at the moment.
answer: This machine is not working at the moment.

options: The librarian needs to see your books before you go.
Make sure you take all your books with you.
Return your books before you leave the library.
The librarian will show you where to put your books.
answer: The librarian needs to see your books before you go.

options: This room cannot be used at present.
This door must always be kept locked.
Lock the room when it is not being used.
Keep the key to this door in the room.
answer: This door must always be kept locked.

options: Supersaver tickets can be used every day except Fridays.
You need a special ticket to travel on a Friday.
Supersaver tickets cannot be bought before the weekend.
You can save money by travelling on a Friday.
answer: Supersaver tickets can be used every day except Fridays.

options: Do not forget to put your luggage outside your room.
Keep the corridor clear of luggage.
Bags left in the corridor will be removed.
Bags will be collected from the corridor.
answer: Keep the corridor clear of luggage.

options: Wait upstairs to see the nurse.
Go upstairs to make an appointment with the nurse.
The nurse will tell you when it is your turn.
The nurse can only see patients with appointments.
answer: The nurse can only see patients with appointments.

options: Do not touch the fruit before paying for it.
Damaged fruit must be paid for.
Choose your fruit and then pay for it.
answer: Choose your fruit and then pay for it.

options: Please be quiet while people are taking their examination.
Do not talk to the examiner.
Do not speak during the examination.
The examiner will tell you when you can talk.
answer: Please be quiet while people are taking their examination.

options: Bring your computer here for repairs.
We will not mend computers bought from other shops.
We charge to repair computers not bought here.
Computers bought here never need repairing.
answer: We will not mend computers bought from other shops.

options: The entrance to the bank is through the library.
The travel agency has moved its entrance.
The library is now a travel agency.
The travel agency is no longer open.
answer: The travel agency has moved its entrance.

options: This list shows who has been chosen to go on the trip.
This list should be signed by people wanting to go on the trip.
Check the list for information if you are going on the trip.
If you find your name on this list, you can go on the trip.
answer: This list should be signed by people wanting to go on the trip.

options: The new ticket office is now open.
There will be two ticket offices after 17 September.
This ticket office will be close for one day.
This ticket office will close on 16 September.
answer: This ticket office will close on 16 September.

options: If you spend less than £10, you cannot pay by credit card.
We prefer cash for large sales.
We make a charge if you pay by credit card.
If you spend more than £10, you must pay by credit card.
answer: If you spend less than £10, you cannot pay by credit card.

options: Dogs must walk with their owners.
Dogs must be kept on a chain.
answer: Dogs must walk with their owners.

options: You can send your groceries from here.
You can store your groceries here.
You can get your free groceries here.
You can have your groceries sent to you.
answer: You can have your groceries sent to you.

options: Cleaning now costs twice as much.
Cleaning costs will stay the same.
You must pay to park here.
If you use the train you can park here.
This space is for railway officials.
No one is allowed to park here.
answer: If you use the train you can park here.

options: You can buy your ticket during the journey.
You pay when you get off.
You have to book a seat before travelling.
You have to buy a ticket before your journey.
answer: You have to buy a ticket before your journey.

options: Passengers are allowed to change their seats.
Passengers are allowed to eat snacks on the bus.
Passengers can make noise on the bus.
Passengers have to follow the bus rules.
answer: Passengers have to follow the bus rules.
